description: Demolition of single storey rear extensions and conservatory, and erection of single storey side and rear extensions
decision_conditions: The proposed single storey rear extension altogether with the existing extensions, would extend beyond a wall forming a side elevation of the original dwellinghouse, and would have a width greater than half the width of the original dwellinghouse, in conflict with Paragraph A.1 (ja) and (j) (iii), of Class A, part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The height of the eaves of the proposed single storey rear extension would exceed 3m in conflict with Paragraph A.1 (i), of Class A, part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The proposed fenestration is not considered to be of a similar appearance to the fenestration in the existing dwellinghouse, in conflict with Condition A.3 (a) of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
LGW Name: London Gatwick Safeguarding Zone (200m)
SMKCON Name: Borough Wide Smoke Control Order
